companions.content:
import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val button = findViewById<Button>(R.id.button)
        val editText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.editText)
        val imageView = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.imageView)
        val priceEditText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.priceEditText)
        val commentButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.commentButton)
        val likeButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.likeButton)

        button.setOnClickListener {
            val intent = Intent(this, UploadActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        commentButton.setOnClickListener {
            val comment = editText.text.toString()
            val price = priceEditText.text.toString().toDouble()
            val likeCount = likeButton.tag as Int
            likeCount++
            likeButton.tag = likeCount
            Toast.makeText(this, "评论成功", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
    }
}
data class Menu(val name: String, val price: Double, val image: String, val comment: String, val likeCount: Int)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="上传菜品" />
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/editText"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="评论" />
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/priceEditText"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="价格" />
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/imageView"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/commentButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="评论" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/likeButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞" />
</LinearLayout>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent">
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="上传图片" />
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/imageView"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
</LinearLayout>

messages.content: 生成一个牛太郎餐厅的介绍菜品的安卓app，要可以上传照片、编辑文字介绍、设定价格、评论点赞

message.content:
{
   "appName": "牛太郎餐厅",
   "homeTitle": "牛太郎餐厅",
   "mainButtonText": "上传菜品",
   "packageId": null,
   "permissions": [
      "android.permission.INTERNET",
      "android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION",
      "android.permission.CAMERA",
      "android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE",
      "android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"
   ],
   "intentHost": null,
   "locales": [
      "zh-CN"
   ],
   "companions": [
      {
         "path": "app/src/main/java/com/example/niutao/MainActivity.kt",
         "kind": "kotlin",
         "content": "import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        val button = findViewById<Button>(R.id.button)
        val editText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.editText)
        val imageView = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.imageView)
        val priceEditText = findViewById<EditText>(R.id.priceEditText)
        val commentButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.commentButton)
        val likeButton = findViewById<Button>(R.id.likeButton)

        button.setOnClickListener {
            val intent = Intent(this, UploadActivity::class.java)
            startActivity(intent)
        }

        commentButton.setOnClickListener {
            val comment = editText.text.toString()
            val price = priceEditText.text.toString().toDouble()
            val likeCount = likeButton.tag as Int
            likeCount++
            likeButton.tag = likeCount
            Toast.makeText(this, "评论成功", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
    }
}
",
         "overwrite": true
      },
      {
         "path": "app/src/main/java/com/example/niutao/UploadActivity.kt",
         "kind": "kotlin",
         "content": "import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import androidx.core.content.FileProvider

class UploadActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_upload)

        val button = findViewById<Button>(R.id.button)
        val imageView = findViewById<ImageView>(R.id.imageView)

        button.setOnClickListener {
            val intent = Intent()
            intent.type = "image/*"
            intent.action = Intent.ACTION_PICK
            startActivityForResult(intent, 1)
        }

        imageView.setOnClickListener {
            val file = File("/sdcard/image.jpg")
            val uri = FileProvider.getUriForFile(this, "com.example.niutao.fileprovider", file)
            val intent = Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW)
            intent.setDataAndType(uri, "image/jpeg")
            startActivity(intent)
        }
    }

    override fun onActivityResult(requestCode: Int, resultCode: Int, data: Intent?) {
        super.onActivityResult(requestCode, resultCode, data)
        if (requestCode == 1 && resultCode == RESULT_OK) {
            val uri = data?.data
            val bitmap = MediaStore.Images.Media.getBitmap(contentResolver, uri)
            val file = File("/sdcard/image.jpg")
            val fos = FileOutputStream(file)
            bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, fos)
            fos.close()
            Toast.makeText(this, "图片上传成功", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
    }
}

    <Button
        android:id="@+id/likeButton"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞" />
</LinearLayout>
